meta.title_en: Political Attitudes Questionnaire (Economy + Culture/Authority + Democratic Norms)

quality.notes_en: Data-quality signals are only for result confidence, not judgment or lie detection.

meta.disclaimer_en: This test is a simplification of multidimensional beliefs. Results are approximate and not a definitive/scientific political identity diagnosis.

items.text_en: Government should reduce class inequality by taxing very high incomes more.
If we must choose, guaranteeing a minimum livelihood for everyone is more important than keeping taxes low.
Worker wages and job security should be protected even if production costs rise.
Government should guarantee access to basic education and healthcare for everyone, even if public spending rises somewhat.
Strong regulation and oversight are needed to curb monopolies and rent-seeking, even if this makes business operations harder.
Free competition usually improves quality and prices better than government intervention.
For economic growth, business regulation should be reduced even if some protections decline.
Well-designed, transparent privatization can deliver services better than state management.
If we must choose, keeping taxes low is more important than expanding welfare services.
The labor market should be flexible even if some people have less job security.
Government assistance should be limited and targeted to avoid dependency.
Freedom of speech should include unpleasant views as long as there is no threat or violence.
People's privacy should be protected, even if stronger surveillance may improve security.
Law should guarantee equal rights for women and men in work and public life.
People should be free to choose their clothing as long as they do not harm others.
Discrimination in work and public services against people with different sexual orientation or gender identity should not be legal.
Ethnic/linguistic minorities should be able to preserve and use their mother tongue in education or media.
Government should not interfere in consensual private relationships between adults.
For public security, the state should be able to expand digital and urban surveillance even at some cost to privacy.
Laws in public spaces should be stricter about behavior and dress to preserve public morality.
The law should recognize marriage only between a man and a woman.
To preserve unity, minorities should adapt to the dominant culture rather than emphasize differences.
Elections should be real, competitive, and allow transfer of power.
Government should change only through people's votes and legal process.
The judiciary should be independent and able to prevent abuse of power.
Media should be able to criticize the government and powerful institutions freely.
Government should be transparent, with public oversight and independent reporting.
If national leaders decide, strong elections and parliament are no longer necessary.
In some situations, military rule can be an appropriate solution.
Having a strong leader is more important than having independent and accountable institutions.
Scenario: The government has 100 new budget units. Which policy mix do you prefer?

choices.label_en: Spend most on public housing/healthcare and direct support for low-income households.
choices.label_fa: بیشتر بودجه صرف مسکن/درمان عمومی و یارانه مستقیم خانوارهای کم‌درآمد شود.

choices.label_en: A support-leaning mix with some allocation to businesses.
choices.label_fa: ترکیبِ متمایل به حمایت اجتماعی با بخشی برای کسب‌وکارها.

choices.label_en: Split equally between social support and market incentives.
choices.label_fa: تقسیم برابر بین حمایت اجتماعی و مشوق‌های بازار.

choices.label_en: Focus more on tax cuts and investment incentives for firms.
choices.label_fa: تمرکز بیشتر بر کاهش مالیات و مشوق سرمایه‌گذاری شرکت‌ها.

choices.label_en: Use almost all of it for market liberalization, tax cuts, and shrinking state support.
choices.label_fa: تقریباً همه بودجه صرف آزادسازی بازار، کاهش مالیات و کوچک‌سازی حمایت‌های دولتی شود.

items.text_en: Scenario: A large city sees widespread but mostly peaceful protests. What policy is best?

choices.label_en: Prioritize assembly/speech rights and intervene only in cases of actual violence.
choices.label_fa: اولویت با حفظ حق تجمع/بیان باشد و مداخله فقط در موارد خشونت واقعی.

choices.label_en: Soft management with minimal restrictions and ongoing negotiation.
choices.label_fa: مدیریت نرم با محدودیت‌های حداقلی و مذاکره مستمر.

choices.label_en: A mixed approach with permits, time/place limits, and dialogue.
choices.label_fa: ترکیبی از مجوز، محدودیت زمانی/مکانی و گفت‌وگو.

choices.label_en: Stricter control to prevent disorder, even with tighter protest limits.
choices.label_fa: کنترل سخت‌گیرانه‌تر برای پیشگیری از بی‌نظمی، حتی با محدودیت آزادی تجمع.

choices.label_en: Maximum restriction of protests and broad immediate enforcement powers.
choices.label_fa: محدودسازی حداکثری اعتراضات و اختیار گسترده برای برخورد فوری.

items.text_en: Scenario: During a security crisis, the government proposes to temporarily sideline parliament. Which option do you prefer?

choices.label_en: Suspend parliament and elections for an open-ended period for fast decisions.
choices.label_fa: کنار گذاشتن پارلمان و انتخابات تا زمان نامعلوم برای سرعت تصمیم‌گیری.

choices.label_en: Grant long-term emergency powers to the executive with limited oversight.
choices.label_fa: اختیارات فوق‌العاده طولانی‌مدت برای دولت با نظارت محدود.

choices.label_en: Allow short emergency powers with periodic review.
choices.label_fa: اختیارات اضطراری کوتاه‌مدت با بازبینی دوره‌ای.

choices.label_en: Keep parliament/courts active and set a clear end date for emergency powers.
choices.label_fa: حفظ نقش پارلمان/دادگاه و زمان‌بندی روشن برای پایان وضعیت اضطراری.

choices.label_en: Even in crisis, preserve full parliamentary oversight, judicial independence, and political competition.
choices.label_fa: حتی در بحران، نظارت پارلمان و استقلال قضایی و امکان رقابت سیاسی باید کامل حفظ شود.

items.text_en: Scenario: Urban rent prices have surged sharply. Which policy package do you prefer?

choices.label_en: Rent caps, vacancy taxes, and large-scale social housing.
choices.label_fa: سقف اجاره، مالیات بر خانه‌های خالی و ساخت مسکن اجتماعی گسترده.

choices.label_en: A tenant-supporting mix with limited supply incentives.
choices.label_fa: ترکیبی از حمایت مستأجران با مشوق محدود برای عرضه بیشتر.

choices.label_en: Balanced mix of rent support and construction easing.
choices.label_fa: ترکیب برابر از حمایت اجاره و تسهیل ساخت‌وساز.

choices.label_en: Mainly deregulate construction and ease housing market rules.
choices.label_fa: تمرکز اصلی بر آزادسازی ساخت‌وساز و کاهش مقررات بازار مسکن.

choices.label_en: No price intervention; rely fully on market mechanisms.
choices.label_fa: عدم مداخله قیمتی؛ تکیه کامل بر مکانیزم بازار و رقابت سازندگان.

items.text_en: Scenario: Urban crime has increased. Which policy package do you prefer?

choices.label_en: Focus on social prevention and local empowerment with minimal punitive expansion.
choices.label_fa: تمرکز بر پیشگیری اجتماعی، آموزش و توانمندسازی محلات با کمترین سخت‌گیری کیفری.

choices.label_en: Limited policing increase with rehabilitation and strong judicial oversight.
choices.label_fa: افزایش محدود پلیس همراه با برنامه‌های بازپروری و نظارت قضایی قوی.

choices.label_en: Balanced mix of social prevention and law enforcement.
choices.label_fa: ترکیب متوازن از پیشگیری اجتماعی و اجرای قانون.

choices.label_en: Significantly expand police powers and urban surveillance.
choices.label_fa: افزایش محسوس اختیارات پلیس و نظارت شهری برای کنترل جرم.

choices.label_en: Maximum hardline policy: harsher penalties and broad security powers.
choices.label_fa: سیاست سخت‌گیرانه حداکثری: مجازات شدیدتر و اختیارات گسترده امنیتی.

items.text_en: Scenario: The government wants to limit critical media for six months. What is your position?

choices.label_en: Fully restrict critical media to preserve "stability".
choices.label_fa: محدودسازی کامل رسانه‌های منتقد برای حفظ «ثبات».

choices.label_en: Broad but temporary restrictions with minimal oversight.
choices.label_fa: محدودیت گسترده اما موقت با نظارت حداقلی.

choices.label_en: Very limited, short-term restrictions with judicial review.
choices.label_fa: محدودیت بسیار محدود، کوتاه‌مدت و قابل بازبینی قضایی.

choices.label_en: Protect media freedom with accountability and legal complaint channels.
choices.label_fa: حفظ آزادی رسانه با سازوکار پاسخگویی و حق شکایت قانونی.

choices.label_en: No political media restrictions; criticism must remain possible even in crisis.
choices.label_fa: عدم محدودیت سیاسی رسانه؛ حتی در بحران هم نقد حکومت باید ممکن باشد.

items.text_en: For quality control, please choose 'Agree' for this question.
For major national decisions, we should flip a coin once a month to move faster.
